item.description:
Greetings!

Current forecast is for the weather to be less-than ideal for Sunday, so we may have to be a bit flexible with our plans. Also, a few have expressed concerns about meeting prior, so here goes…

If it is raining as currently predicted, members are welcome to attend this event as they wish, however I will not be attending. Chances are I will be spending plenty of time outside in the rain this weekend and feel I could better serve preparing for Sunday night.

If the weather changes (it is New England) then I will meet everyone in the Parking lot of America Stonehenge at 1:15 PM. The ceremony starts at 2 and they request you show up by 1:30 to make the trek up the hill to the meeting place. Bring flowers and a picnic lunch/snacks if you wish. Admission is $10 which doesn’t sound like much but could be a hardship in these times, so if you need assistance with that or are able to offer assistance to others let me know privately in an email. I would hate to see anyone miss this over financial concerns.

Either way our Circle will take place as scheduled, 7PM (Goddess willing!) at the UUCH.

If you have any questions email me and I will try to respond when I get back Sat or Sun.

Details on AS are at:

http://www.stonehenge...

and

http://www.stonehenge...

BB!
item.name: Class & Open Circle - MidSummer
